data.actual_result: profile pictures/icons show as 2 for a second after disconnecting
data.expected_result: there shouldn't be any duplicated profile pictures
data.short_description: duplicated user profile picture when disconnecting from a screenshare enabled voice channel after collapsing the category
data.steps_to_repro: - be lucky enough to have a screenshare enabled server - connect to a voice channel - collapse the category - disconnect - observe
